Gum health is crucial during braces treatment, as trapped food and plaque can lead to gingivitis. Let’s keep those gums pink and healthy.

Common Gum Issues with Braces

  • Inflammation: Wires irritate soft tissues.
  • Bleeding: Poor hygiene exacerbates this.

Pro Tips for Healthy Gums

  1. Floss Daily with Tools: Use a floss threader or water flosser to clean under wires.
  2. Antimicrobial Rinse: Rinse with chlorhexidine (prescribed) twice weekly to fight bacteria.
  3. Soft Bristle Brush: Angle your brush at 45 degrees to massage gums gently.
  4. Diet Tweaks: Cut sugary snacks to reduce plaque buildup.
